title: Golden Globes Presenters Include George Clooney, Julia Roberts, Charli xcx, Snoop Dogg and More
summary: The Golden Globes has announced its lineup of presenters for this weekend’s awards ceremony. The starry list include George Clooney, Julia Roberts, Charli xcx, Snoop Dogg and “Heated Rivalry” stars Connor Storrie and Hudson Williams. Also presenting are Amanda Seyfried, Ana de Armas, Ayo Edebiri, C…

title: Petra Volpe, Director of Oscar-Shortlisted ‘Late Shift,’ to Receive Zurich’s Golden Eye Award
summary: The Zurich Film Festival will honor Swiss director Petra Volpe on Monday with the Golden Eye Award for her film “Late Shift,” which is on the shortlist for the Academy Award for best international feature film. The award will be presented alongside a screening of the film for members of the Academy…
